title: Defeat Ketheric Thorm
content:
the lives of everyone in Faerun. They tell you that the Army of the Absolute is marching towards Baldur's Gate and that the elder brain has the power to turn everyone into Mind Flayers. They tell you that you need to seize control of the elder brain and they will offer to be your shield but asks that you must be the sword.

How to unlock Defeat Ketheric Thorm

Quest Giver / Location

Defeat Ketheric Thorm Rewards

Defeat Ketheric Thorm Notes & Tips

You need to solve the mind Puzzle in Mind Flay
